Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product holds significant value for us, reflecting years of research and development. Considering its quality and uniqueness, we believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or business. For this exceptional item, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $15000. We are confident that you will find its features and benefits to be well worth the investment. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of sharing this remarkable product with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
